summary: Diff adds a single-page Rose Day UI with centered hero image, romantic copy, animated gradient background overlays (bokeh/dust/sparkles), floating petals and scroll-reactive hearts, plus a footer message. However, the required generated image assets are not present in the diff, and unrelated Internet Identity/auth/actor plumbing is introduced despite being a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (hero illustration and overlay texture) and render them via static paths (no backend endpoints).
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the two required PNGs via /assets/generated/... but the diff does not add any files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the required generated assets themselves are not implemented in the change set.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and identity-aware backend actor hook (login/clear/status) introduced.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity login flows as a non-goal for this single-page hardcoded site; no auth is required to meet any REQ-1..REQ-8 acceptance criteria.
Backend work was to be added only if strictly necessary for a static single-page site; requirements specify images must be served statically from the frontend and no backend endpoints are needed.
